name: WorldwideSurfReport
0:
”Alexa Open Surf Report”
”Alexa ask surf report to describe steamer lane”
”Alexa ask surf report for the report at Pipeline tomorrow”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: surf report
des: Get the surf report for over 4000 locations all over the world with descriptions for each break. The most fully featured surfing skill available on Alexa. Say "Alexa Open Surf Report" to begin. You can also start off right away by saying "Alexa ask surf report to describe steamer lane", or "Alexa ask surf report for the report at Pipeline tommorow". Surf forecasts are powered by the MagicSeaweed API.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
